SELECT roadnum,road2.* FROM( SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY road.no) AS roadnum, road.* FROM MEMBER road WHERE grade = 1
AND id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY road.no ) road2 WHERE roadnum BETWEEN #{dpPost} AND #{postNum}+ #{dpPost}-1 ORDER BY road2.no

SELECT COUNT(id) AS cnt FROM MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND grade = 1
AND id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT roadnum,road2.* FROM( SELECT row_number() OVER(ORDER BY road.no) AS roadnum, road.* FROM MEMBER road WHERE grade = 2 AND id NOT in (#{exclude})
AND id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY road.no ) road2 WHERE roadnum BETWEEN #{dpPost} AND #{postNum}+ #{dpPost}-1 ORDER BY road2.no

SELECT COUNT(id) cnt FROM MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND grade = 2 AND id NOT in (#{exclude})
AND id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
